summary.span: 提供设计图面，该设计图面呈现流程的可视表示形式。

span.span: Provides a design surface, which renders a visual representation of process flow.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 是设计图面，该设计图面呈现在工作流标记中描述的流程的可视表示形式。 is the design surface which renders a visual representation of process flow described in workflow markup. 提供一组丰富的用户界面功能，活动设计器需要这些功能来呈现和响应各种 Windows 生成的事件。 offers a rich set of user interface functionality needed by the activity designers for rendering and for responding to various Windows-generated events. 另外， 提供一组常用函数，所有设计器都可以使用这些函数执行特定的活动。Also, the offers a set of common functions which can be used by all designers to perform certain activities. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法来获取 类的实例。The following code example demonstrates how you can obtain an instance of the class using the method. 代码随后设置若干 属性，包括 和 ，然后调用 方法。The code then sets several properties, including and , and calls the method. 此代码示例摘自 WorkflowDesignerControl.cs 文件中的工作流跟踪配置文件设计器 SDK 示例。This code example is part of the Workflow Tracking Profile Designer SDK Sample from the WorkflowDesignerControl.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[工作流跟踪配置文件设计器](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms742004(v=vs.90))。For more information, see [Workflow Tracking Profile Designer](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms742004(v=vs.90)). remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个组件，它处理来自 的消息。A is a component that handles messages from the . 使用 `Strategy` 设计模式， 会将消息传递到 以进行处理。Using the `Strategy` design pattern, the will pass messages to the to be handled. 鼠标事件、键盘事件、绘画和布局事件传递到与 关联的 。Mouse events, keyboard events, paint and layout events are passed on to a associated with the . ## Examples 在下面的示例中，创建了一个 ，并将 对象与工作流设计图面相关联。In the following example, a is created and a object is associated with the workflow design surface. 为了检索消息的通知，创建了一个 并将其添加到了 对象。In order to retrieve notifications of messages, a is created and added to the object. 此代码示例摘自 WorkflowViewWrapper.cs 文件中的 Outlook 工作流向导 SDK 示例。This code example is part of the Outlook Workflow Wizard SDK Sample from the WorkflowViewWrapper.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Outlook 工作流向导示例](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7b2ba92b-8456-43f3-87fc-184ffdec4408)。For more information, see [Outlook Workflow Wizard Sample](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7b2ba92b-8456-43f3-87fc-184ffdec4408). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用两个坐标空间：逻辑和工作区： uses two coordinate spaces: logical and client: - 工作区坐标相对于 的左上角。Client coordinates are relative to the upper-left corner of the . 左上角的坐标是 0,0；在可视区域中，x 和 y 坐标沿垂直和水平方向增加。The upper-left corner is 0,0; x and y coordinates increase vertically and horizontally in the viewable area. 工作区坐标系统受 的缩放级别和滚动条位置的影响。The client coordinate system is affected by the zoom level of the and by the scrollbar position. - 在逻辑坐标系统中，每个对象始终映射到 0,0。In the logical coordinate system every object is always mapped to 0,0. 该位置在垂直方向和水平方向不受缩放级别或滚动条位置的影响。The position vertically and horizontally is not affected by zoom or scrollbar position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当处置参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放此 引用的所有托管对象所持有的全部资源。When the disposing parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object. 有关 `Dispose` 和 `Finalize`的详细信息，请参阅[清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged)和[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。For more information about `Dispose` and `Finalize`, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写 时，请注意不要引用在以前调用 时已释放的对象。

para.span: 有关如何实现 的详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用两个坐标空间：逻辑和工作区： uses two coordinate spaces: logical and client: - 工作区坐标相对于 的左上角。Client coordinates are relative to the upper-left corner of the . 左上角的坐标是 0,0；在可视区域中，x 和 y 坐标沿垂直和水平方向增加。The upper-left corner is 0,0; x and y coordinates increase vertically and horizontally in the viewable area. 工作区坐标系统受 的缩放级别和滚动条位置的影响。The client coordinate system is affected by the zoom level of the and by the scrollbar position. 在逻辑坐标系统中，每个对象始终映射到 0,0。In the logical coordinate system every object is always mapped to 0,0. 该位置在垂直方向和水平方向不受缩放级别或滚动条位置的影响。The position vertically and horizontally is not affected by zoom or scrollbar position.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnQueryContinueDrag(class System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs qcdevent) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnQueryContinueDrag (qcdevent As QueryContinueDragEventArgs)

param.name: qcdevent
param.span: 一个 ，包含有关事件的信息。

span.span: A that contains information about the event.

summary.span: 在拖动操作期间发生，并且允许拖动源确定是否应取消拖动操作。

span.span: Occurs during a drag operation and allows the drag source to determine whether the drag option should be canceled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在拖动操作过程中，当键盘或鼠标按钮状态发生变化时，会引发 事件。The event is raised when there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state during a drag operation. 事件允许拖动源确定是否应取消拖放操作。The event allows the drag source to determine whether the drag operation should be canceled. 当控件是有效的放置目标时引发与拖动操作相关的事件。Events related to drag operations are raised when the control is a valid drop target. 以指定的拖动效果引发 事件。The event is raised with the drag effect specified. 有关拖动效果的列表，请参见 枚举。For a list of drag effects, see the enumeration. 跟踪鼠标光标位置、键盘状态和鼠标按钮状态的更改。Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked. - 如果用户移出一个窗口，则引发 事件。If the user moves out of a window, the event is raised. - 如果鼠标进入另一个控件，则引发该控件的 。If the mouse enters another control, the for that control is raised. - 如果鼠标移动但停留在同一个控件中，则引发 事件。If the mouse moves but stays within the same control, the event is raised. 如果键盘或鼠标按钮状态发生了更改，则引发 事件并根据事件 `Action` 的 属性值确定是否继续拖动、放置数据或取消操作。If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the `Action` property of the event . 如果该值为 `DragAction.Continue`，则会引发 事件以继续操作，并引发 事件以产生新效果，从而能够设置适当的视觉反馈。If the value is `DragAction.Continue`, the event is raised to continue the operation and the event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set. 有关有效放置效果的列表，请参见 枚举。For a list of valid drop effects, see the enumeration. > [!NOTE] > 和 事件成对出现，从而当鼠标从放置目标上移动时，就能够为用户提供有关鼠标位置的最新反馈。The and events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse position. 如果该值为 `DragAction.Drop`，则放置效果值将返回到源，以便源应用程序可以对源数据执行适当的操作；例如，如果是移动操作，则剪切数据。If the value is `DragAction.Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move. 如果该值为 `DragAction.Cancel`，则会引发 事件。If the value is `DragAction.Cancel`, the event is raised. 默认情况下，如果按 Esc 键，则 事件将 `Action` 设置为 `DragAction.Cancel`；如果按鼠标左键、中键或右键，则将 `Action` 设置为 `DragAction.Drop`。By default, the event sets `Action` to `DragAction.Cancel` if the ESC key was pressed and sets `Action` to `DragAction.Drop` if the left, middle, or right mouse button is pressed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用两个坐标空间：逻辑和工作区： uses two coordinate spaces: logical and client: 工作区坐标相对于 的左上角。Client coordinates are relative to the upper-left corner of the . 左上角的坐标是 0,0；在可视区域中，x 和 y 坐标沿垂直和水平方向增加。The upper-left corner is 0,0; x and y coordinates increase vertically and horizontally in the viewable area. 工作区坐标系统受 的缩放级别和滚动条位置的影响。The client coordinate system is affected by the zoom level of the and by the scrollbar position. 在逻辑坐标系统中，每个对象始终映射到 0,0。In the logical coordinate system every object is always mapped to 0,0. 该位置在垂直方向和水平方向不受缩放级别或滚动条位置的影响。The position vertically and horizontally is not affected by zoom or scrollbar position.
